mapper.select: SELECT u.username "u_username", u.email "email", u.phone "phone", p.id "p_id" FROM user u, product p WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT user_id "user_id", address_name "address_name", address "address", address_detail "address_detail", postcode "postcode" FROM address WHERE user_id = #{id} AND address_name = #{address_name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales (u_username, p_id, amount, address, address_detail, postcode, deliveryreq) VALUES (#{u_username}, #{p_id}, #{amount}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{postcode}, #{deliveryreq})
